snippet: Sheriff Victor Hill of Clayton County, who is being investigated for injuring a woman in a shooting, called it a “tragic and heartbreaking accident.”
lead_paragraph: Sheriff Victor Hill of Clayton County, who is being investigated for injuring a woman in a shooting, called it a “tragic and heartbreaking accident.”

headline.main: Georgia: Sheriff Accused in Shooting Refuses to Talk to the Police
headline.print_headline: Georgia: Sheriff Accused In Shooting Refuses To Talk To the Police
